t: Canon and Amazon win default judgment in the U.S. against counterfeiters of camera accessories | Canon Global
s: The legal action was filed in May 2023 in the United States District Court for the Western District of Washington against 29 selling accounts which sold camera batteries and chargers in the Amazon store in the U.S., alleging infringement of Canon's trademark rights.

t: Canon requests removal of toner cartridges from Amazon.com, including Toner H-Party brand cartridges sold by True Printing | Canon Global
s: Canon's infringement report filed on March 10, 2025 identified, among others, the product offerings shown in the table below and alleged that cartridges sold under these offerings infringe Canon's U.S. Patent No. 11,215,949.

t: Amazon and Canon file joint lawsuit to protect customers and hold counterfeiters accountable
s: May 11, 2023 - Amazon and Canon have filed a joint lawsuit targeting bad actors alleged to have sold counterfeit Canon camera batteries and chargers.
